name: Vanessa Standard
what_you_do: Creator of the Self-Love Face Yoga Method™, helping women 50+ rediscover confidence, radiance, and self-love through face yoga and life coaching.
business_focus: Helping women 50+ build confidence and rediscover their radiance through face yoga and self-love practices.
who_you_serve: Women 50+ who are ready to feel confident, radiant, and alive again.
bio: Vanessa Standard is a Certified Life Coach, 500-hour Yoga Teacher, Certified Face Yoga Instructor, and holds a Master's Degree in Spiritual Psychology. She is the creator of the Self-Love Face Yoga Method™, a transformational program for women 50+. She is also a bestselling author and audiobook narrator.
service_provided: Face yoga instruction, life coaching, online education programs, audiobook narration
signature_programs: Self-Love Face Yoga Method™, Reinvent Your Radiance Method™
